description: Enhanced MRtrix3 pipeline for single-shell DTI data with fieldmap-based distortion correction and robust preprocessing
optimized_for: b=1000 single-shell DTI data with dual-echo fieldmap correction

required_inputs.DTI_MOSAIC_NIFTI: Main DTI data in NIFTI format
required_inputs._comment_fieldmap_inputs_added_20250725: FIELDMAP SUPPORT ADDED 7/25/2025 - Following inputs added for distortion correction
required_inputs._comment_pe_readout_added_20250725: PE/READOUT PARAMETERS ENHANCED 7/25/2025 - For fieldmap integration
required_inputs.PE_DIR: Phase encoding direction (e.g., j-, j, i-, i)
required_inputs.READOUTTIME: Total EPI readout time in seconds

steps.name: step1-mrconvert_DTI
steps.description: Convert DTI NIFTI to MIF format with gradient information

steps.name: step2-dwiextract_b0
steps.description: Extract all b=0 images from DTI data

steps.name: step3-mrconvert_mean_b0
steps.description: Calculate mean b=0 image for registration reference

steps.name: step4-dwidenoise
steps.description: MP-PCA denoising of DTI data

steps.name: step5-mrcalc_denoise_residual
steps.description: Calculate denoising residual for quality assessment

steps.name: step6-mrdegibbs
steps.description: Remove Gibbs ringing artifacts (recommended for single-shell)

steps.name: step6b-fieldmap_mag_convert
steps.description: Convert second magnitude image (better contrast) to MIF format

steps.name: step6c-fieldmap_phase_convert
steps.description: Convert phase difference image to MIF format

steps.name: step6d-fieldmap_brain_extract
steps.cmd: mrconvert OUTPUT/fieldmap_mag.mif OUTPUT/fieldmap_mag.nii.gz -force && bet2 OUTPUT/fieldmap_mag.nii.gz OUTPUT/fieldmap_mag_brain.nii.gz -f 0.5 -m
steps.description: Brain extract the magnitude image for fieldmap preparation

steps.name: step6e-fieldmap_phasediff_convert
steps.description: Convert phase mif to nii.gz

steps.name: step6g-fieldmap_prepare
steps.cmd: fsl_prepare_fieldmap SIEMENS OUTPUT/fieldmap_phase.nii.gz OUTPUT/fieldmap_mag_brain.nii.gz OUTPUT/fieldmap_rads.nii.gz DELTA_TE
steps.description: Prepare fieldmap in radians for TOPUP (assumes Siemens format)
steps.notes: Change SIEMENS to appropriate vendor if needed

steps.name: step6h-create_acqparams
steps.description: Create acquisition parameters file for TOPUP (assumes j PE direction)
steps.notes: Adjust phase encoding direction vector based on PE_DIR parameter

steps.name: step6i-create_hz
steps.description: Convert RAD file to HZ for dwifslpreproc

steps.name: step7-dwifslpreproc_fieldmap
steps.description: FSL-based preprocessing with fieldmap-based distortion correction

steps.name: step8-dwibiascorrect
steps.description: ANTs N4 bias field correction

steps.name: step9-dwi2mask
steps.description: Generate brain mask from DTI data - will be skipped if pre-existing *epb51_T2_mask.nii is found

steps.name: step10-dwi2response_tournier
steps.cmd: dwi2response tournier OUTPUT/dwi_den_preproc_unbiased.mif OUTPUT/wm_tournier.txt -mask OUTPUT/mask.mif -voxels OUTPUT/voxels_tournier.mif -force
steps.description: Tournier response function estimation (primary method for single-shell)

steps.name: step12-dwi2fod_csd
steps.cmd: dwi2fod csd -mask OUTPUT/mask.mif OUTPUT/dwi_den_preproc_unbiased.mif OUTPUT/wm_tournier.txt OUTPUT/wmfod_tournier.mif -force
steps.description: Single-shell CSD FOD estimation (white matter only)

steps.name: step13-mtnormalise_single
steps.description: Single-tissue FOD intensity normalization

steps.name: step14-anat_convert
steps.description: Convert anatomical image to MIF format

steps.name: step15-5ttgen
steps.description: Generate 5-tissue-type segmentation

steps.name: step16-dwiextract_final_b0
steps.description: Extract b=0 from preprocessed data

steps.name: step17-mrmath_mean_final_b0
steps.description: Calculate mean b=0 from preprocessed data

steps.name: step18-mrconvert_b0_to_FSL
steps.description: Convert mean b=0 to NIFTI for FSL registration

steps.name: step19-mrconvert_seg_to_FSL
steps.description: Convert 5TT segmentation to NIFTI

steps.name: step20-fslroi
steps.description: Extract first volume (GM) from 5TT segmentation

steps.name: step21-flirt_coregister
steps.description: Coregister diffusion to structural (6 DOF) - standard approach

steps.name: step21b-flirt_bbr_enhanced
steps.cmd: flirt -in OUTPUT/mean_b0_processed.nii.gz -ref OUTPUT/5tt_vol0.nii.gz -dof 6 -cost bbr -wmseg OUTPUT/5tt_vol0.nii.gz -init OUTPUT/diff2struct_fsl.mat -omat OUTPUT/diff2struct_bbr.mat -schedule $FSLDIR/etc/flirtsch/bbr.sch
steps.description: Enhanced BBR coregistration for legacy DTI (optional - comment out if issues)

steps.name: step22-transformconvert
steps.cmd: transformconvert OUTPUT/diff2struct_fsl.mat OUTPUT/mean_b0_processed.nii.gz OUTPUT/5tt_nocoreg.nii.gz flirt_import OUTPUT/diff2struct_mrtrix.txt
steps.description: Convert FSL transformation to MRtrix format (use BBR version if available)

steps.name: step23-mrtransform
steps.description: Apply transformation to bring 5TT to diffusion space

steps.name: step24-5tt2gmwmi
steps.description: Generate GM-WM interface for seeding

steps.name: step25-tckgen
steps.description: Generate 10M streamlines using single-shell FODs (higher cutoff for single-shell)

steps.name: step26-tckedit
steps.description: Create subset of 200k tracks for visualization

steps.name: step27-tcksift
steps.description: SIFT filtering to 1M biologically plausible streamlines

steps.name: step28-convert_mask
steps.description: Convert mask to NIFTI format

steps.name: step29-apply_mask
steps.description: Apply brain mask to mean b=0 image

steps.name: step30-antsReg_template
steps.description: Register template to native space using ANTs

steps.name: step31-BN_transform
steps.description: Transform Brainnetome atlas to native diffusion space

steps.name: step32-freesurfer_labelconvert_DK
steps.description: Convert FreeSurfer DK atlas to MRtrix format

steps.name: step33-freesurfer_labelsgmfix_DK
steps.description: Fix FreeSurfer segmentation issues

steps.name: step34-freesurfer_transform_DK
steps.description: Transform FreeSurfer DK atlas to diffusion space

steps.name: step35-freesurfer_labelconvert_Destrieux
steps.description: Convert FreeSurfer Destrieux atlas to MRtrix format

steps.name: step36-freesurfer_transform_Destrieux
steps.description: Transform FreeSurfer Destrieux atlas to diffusion space

steps.name: step37-connectome_Brainnetome_counts
steps.description: Generate Brainnetome connectome (streamline counts)

steps.name: step38-connectome_Brainnetome_scaled
steps.description: Generate Brainnetome connectome (volume-normalized)

steps.name: step39-connectome_FreeSurfer_DK_counts
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer DK connectome (streamline counts)

steps.name: step40-connectome_FreeSurfer_DK_scaled
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer DK connectome (volume-normalized)

steps.name: step41-connectome_FreeSurfer_Destrieux_counts
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer Destrieux connectome (streamline counts)

steps.name: step42-connectome_FreeSurfer_Destrieux_scaled
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer Destrieux connectome (volume-normalized)

_comment_fieldmap_config_added_20250725: FIELDMAP CONFIGURATION SECTION ADDED 7/25/2025 - Provides guidance for fieldmap setup and parameters

quality_checks: Verify fieldmap covers same slice locations as DTI

_comment_pipeline_notes_enhanced_2025072: PIPELINE NOTES ENHANCED 7/25/2025 - Added fieldmap-specific guidance

pipeline_notes.fieldmap_fallback: If fieldmaps are not available, the pipeline will fall back to step7-dwifslpreproc_fallback
pipeline_notes.conditional_execution: Steps with 'conditional' field should be executed based on data availability
pipeline_notes.vendor_compatibility: Fieldmap preparation assumes Siemens format - adjust fsl_prepare_fieldmap vendor parameter as needed
pipeline_notes.pe_direction_config: The acqparams.txt creation in step6f assumes j direction - modify based on actual PE_DIR
